errors.error_description: Installation instructions show installing dependencies with pip before setting up a virtual environment, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates: Create a virtual environment first using python -m venv flavio-env, activate it, then install dependencies
Use conda to create an isolated environment before installing any packages
Install dependencies system-wide using apt-get install python3-numpy python3-scipy python3-matplotlib
Remove the pip install step entirely and rely on setup.py to handle dependencies
errors.golden_answer: Create a virtual environment first using python -m venv flavio-env, activate it, then install dependencies

errors.error_description: Uses deprecated python setup.py install command instead of modern pip installation
correction_candidates: Replace with pip install . to install from source directory
Use python -m pip install --editable . for development installation
Change to pip install flavio to install from PyPI
Use conda install flavio from conda-forge channel
